title._content: Image taken from page 10 of '[What I saw in California: being the journal of a tour by the emigrant route and south pass of the Rocky Mountains, across the continent of North America, the Great Desert Basin and through California in the years 1846, 1847.]

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[What I saw in California: being the journal of a tour by the emigrant route and south pass of the Rocky Mountains, across the continent of North America, the Great Desert Basin and through California in the years 1846, 1847.]" Author: Bryant, Edwin F. (Edwin Francis) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.b.2." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1849 Publisher: D. Appleton & Co. Edition: Seventh edition. With an appendix, containing accounts of the gold mines, etc. [With a map.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000510493 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
